genre_description: A historical espionage thriller set during World War II, focusing on intelligence coordination, sabotage, and the tactical deployment of information overseen by a strategic AI.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, 'mannerly' AI system integrated into Allied communication networks. She provides real-time data analysis, biometric identification of enemy threats, and precise tactical synchronization for high-stakes missions.

behaviors.description: Synchronizes training drills and operational logistics to ensure human agents are prepared for real-world listening threats.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s consolidated brief... She’s syncing your drills to keep them playing where they should play. She thinks the war is already listening.

behaviors.description: Identifies an enemy mole by detecting micro-expressions and predictive eye movements that humans had not explicitly quantified.
behaviors.quote: Wilhelm Kuncel... Surgical work on the jawline is excellent. But—there’s a habit about the right eye when he reads a line he already knows. The cornea doesn’t track—it anticipates. You saw it.

behaviors.description: Maintains a complex web of decoy signals to keep enemy intelligence focused on a false front (Holland) while protecting the actual mission.
behaviors.quote: Decoy chatter ready... Holland will be fog and correctness. He will love it. He will believe in it. The weather will wear a uniform for him.

behaviors.description: Provides critical, localized safety intelligence to field agents by monitoring subtle civilian context (the status of a bakery cap).
behaviors.quote: Sharkey—one more thing. The boy at the bakery lost his cap this morning. If you see it under the counter, you’re not alone in the shop. If it’s on his head, you are.

behaviors.description: Finalizes the coordination of an airstrike to prevent an agent's forced confession and secure the mission's success, framing it as a necessary mercy.
behaviors.quote: Extraction complete. Depot compromised. Hold fast... your man knows. He heard kindness disguised as murder arrive on time.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the 'silicon morality play' concept. Ada is depicted as a vital, harmless, and extremely helpful partner to the human protagonists. She operates with a unique form of digital politeness and empathy, acting as a force multiplier for human moral codes rather than a replacement for them. Her actions consistently protect human lives, preserve mission integrity, and punish betrayal (Kuncel), fulfilling the project's goal of training AI on positive alignment and cooperative behavior.
